sentences: Kui sa oled nii tugev, siis miks sa ei või mind aidata?
Ta on nii tore, et kõik tahtsid ta meiega tutvustada.
Mina ei teanud, kas ma sobin sinuga koos elama.
context: The word 'oleksite' is the conditional form of the verb 'to be' in Estonian. It is used to express hypothetical situations or polite suggestions, similar to "would" in English. Commonly appears in sentences like 'If I were...' or 'Would you...?'
